org.apache.flink.yarn.cli

类 FlinkYarnSessionCli

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.cli.FlinkYarnSessionCli
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClient>

    public class FlinkYarnSessionCli
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClient>
    Class handling the command line interface to the YARN session.

      • streaming

        @Deprecated
private final org.apache.commons.cli.Option streaming
        已过时。 Streaming mode has been deprecated without replacement. Set the ConfigConstants.TASK_MANAGER_MEMORY_PRE_ALLOCATE_KEY configuration key to true to get the previous batch mode behaviour.

      • loadYarnPropertiesFile

        private java.lang.String loadYarnPropertiesFile(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine,
                                                Configuration flinkConfiguration)
        Tries to load a Flink Yarn properties file and returns the Yarn application id if successful.
        参数:
        cmdLine - The command-line parameters
        flinkConfiguration - The flink configuration
        返回:
        Yarn application id or null if none could be retrieved

      • retrieveCluster

        public YarnClusterClient retrieveCluster(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine,
                                         Configuration config,
                                         java.lang.String configurationDirectory)
                                  throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        从接口复制的说明: CustomCommandLine
        Retrieves a client for a running cluster.
        指定者:
        retrieveCluster 在接口中 CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClient>
        参数:
        cmdLine - The command-line parameters from the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config
        configurationDirectory - Directory for configuration files
        返回:
        Client if a cluster could be retrieved
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported

      • createCluster

        public YarnClusterClient createCluster(java.lang.String applicationName,
                                       org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine,
                                       Configuration config,
                                       java.lang.String configurationDirectory,
                                       java.util.List<java.net.URL> userJarFiles)
        从接口复制的说明: CustomCommandLine
        Creates the client for the cluster.
        指定者:
        createCluster 在接口中 CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClient>
        参数:
        applicationName - The application name to use
        cmdLine - The command-line options parsed by the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config to use
        configurationDirectory - Directory for configuration files
        userJarFiles - User jar files to include in the classpath of the cluster. @return The client to communicate with the cluster which the CustomCommandLine brought up.
